title: Structural - Error: DB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: DB130 - Household data record is missing in H-file (or to drop) or DB130 not filled correctly
where: (DB130 = 11 and DB135 = 1 and HB030 = .) or (DB130 ne 11 and HB030 ne .)

title: Structural - Error: DB135 - Records are missing in R- or P-file or DB135 not filled correctly
Structural - Error: DB135 - In R- or P-file records to drop (or are missing) or DB135 not filled correctly
Structural - Error: RB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: RB030 - Corresponding household does not exist in D-file
Structural - Warning: RB245 - Age and eligibility are not consistent
where: (AGE >= 16 and RB245 not in (1,2,3)) or (AGE < 16 and RB245 in (1,2,3))

title: Structural - Error: RB245 - Codes 1 and (2,3) cannot be mixed within the same household
Structural - Error: RB245 - Only one person can be selected respondant in the same household
Structural - Error: RB250 - Data can be collected only from eligible persons
Structural - Error: RB250 - Personal data record is missing in P-file or RB250 not filled correctly
Structural - Warning: RB080 RB090 - Age at date of interview is -1
Structural - Error: HB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: PB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: PB130 PB140 PB150 - Birth date and sex must be equal in R- and P-file
where: (PB130 ne RB070) or (PB140 ne RB080) or (PB150 ne RB090)

title: Structural - Error: RB070 RB080 RB090 - Birth date or sex are missing
Structural - Warning: PB130 PB140 PB150 - Birth date or sex are missing
Relationchip - Error: RB220 - Father is not household member or does not exist
where: a.RB220_F ge 0 and  a.RHID ne b.RHID

title: Relationchip - Error: RB220 - The person cannot be his own father
Relationchip - Error: RB230 - Mother is not household member or does not exist
where: a.RB230_F ge 0 and  a.RHID ne b.RHID

title: Relationchip - Error: RB230 - The person cannot be his own mother
Relationchip - Error: RB220 - Sex of father cannot be female
Relationchip - Error: RB230 - Sex of mother cannot be male
Relationchip - Warning:  RB230 - Child should be at least 15 years younger than its mother
select: a.RHID,a.RB030,a.RB070,a.RB080,a.AGE,a.RB230,b.RB070 as m_RB070,b.RB080 as m_RB080,b.AGE as m_AGE
where: a.RB230_F ge 0 and b.AGE - a.AGE < 15 and a.AGE ge 0 and b.AGE ge 0

title: Basic Data - Error: PB060 PB070 - Not selected respondant but value is filled
Basic Data - Error: PB060 PB070 Selected respondant but value is not filled
where: PB060_F ne 1 and PB070_F ne 1  and SELRES = 2

title: Status - Warning: Self defined economic status as in compulsory military service but younger than 18 or older than 55
